title: Access Point
description: This entity describes an Access Point which is a networking hardware that generates a wireless network and allows other Wi-Fi devices to connect to it

type.description: Property. NGSI Entity type. It has to be AccessPoint

apState.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. Enum:'up, down'. Indicates whether the access point is working (value: up), or it is not working or shut down (value: down). Model:'http://schema.org/Text'. Enum:'up, down'

clientsConnected.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Number of clients or users connected to the access point.

ssid.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. List of the names of the SSID (service set identifier) that the access point generates. One access point can generate one or several SSID.

service.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. This attribute is used to assign the access point to one or several municipal service departments that receive the wireless service. For example: Library, Museums, Social Services, Sports...

anyOf.description: Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity
Property. Identifier format of any NGSI entity

refPointOfInterest.description: Relationship. Model:'https://schema.org/URL'. The point of interest where the access point is located and provides the service.

TimeInstant.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. [Timestamp](https://github.com/telefonicaid/iotagent-node-lib#TimeInstant) saved by FIWARE's IoT Agent. Note: This attribute has not been harmonized to keep backwards compatibility with current FIWARE reference implementations.

dateInstalled.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. A timestamp which denotes when the device was installed (if it requires installation).

dateLastReboot.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. A timestamp which denotes the last time when the device was successfully rebooted.

dateLastValueReported.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/DateTime'. A timestamp which denotes the last time when the device successfully reported data to the cloud.

firmwareVersion.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The firmware version of this device.

hardwareVersion.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The hardware version of this device.

ipAddress.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The IP address of the device.

osVersion.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The version of the host operating system device.

serialNumber.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/serialNumber'. The serial number assigned by the manufacturer.

softwareVersion.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Text'. The software version of this device.
